Uses of Interface
org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme.RememberMeServices

Packages that use RememberMeServices
org.springframework.security.ui Authentication processing mechanisms, which respond to the submission of authentication credentials using various protocols (eg BASIC, CAS, form login etc). 
org.springframework.security.ui.basicauth Authenticates HTTP BASIC authentication requests. 
org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme Support for remembering a user between different web sessions.

Uses of RememberMeServices in org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme
 

Classes in org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme that implement RememberMeServices
 class AbstractRememberMeServices
          Base class for RememberMeServices implementations.
 class NullRememberMeServices
          Implementation of NullRememberMeServices that does nothing.
 class PersistentTokenBasedRememberMeServices
          RememberMeServices implementation based on Barry Jaspan's Improved Persistent Login Cookie Best Practice.
 class TokenBasedRememberMeServices
          Identifies previously remembered users by a Base-64 encoded cookie.
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme that return RememberMeServices
 RememberMeServices RememberMeProcessingFilter.getRememberMeServices()
           
 

Methods in org.springframework.security.ui.rememberme with parameters of type RememberMeServices
